name: @checkmarx/vscode-core
description: Shared core library for Checkmarx VS Code extensions

scripts.compile: tsc -p ./ && npm run copymedia && npm run copytestproject
scripts.test: export TEST=true && npm run compile && extest setup-and-run './out/test/**/*test.js' -c 1.88.1 -i -r .
scripts.win-test: set TEST=true&& npm run compile && extest setup-and-run './out/test/**/*test.js' -c 1.88.1 -i -r .
scripts.test:ui-end-to-end: export TEST=uiEndToEnd && npm run compile && extest setup-and-run './out/e2e/getScan.test.js' -c 1.88.1 -i -r .
scripts.win-test:ui-end-to-end: set TEST=uiEndToEnd&& npm run compile && extest setup-and-run './out/e2e/getScan.test.js' -c 1.88.1 -i -r .
